title: Car Zone
description: Admin can interact with All Sellers, All Buyers, and Reported Items (Coming Soon)
Buyer can book a car and finally purchase the car
Sellers can upload a new car and he can advertise their unsold car

title: Doctors Portal
description: Patient can book an appointment in different time slots as his/her needs
Admin has all patients and all users access, he can delete anyone
After making an appointment, a patient needs to pay with stripe for a confirmation appointment

title: Pepperoni
description: Option for Add a new Pizza item & Applied User Authentication
On the pizza details page a user can submit a review and see all previous user reviews
A User can see, modify or delete the reviews on my reviews page

title: Learn With Neasher
description: A user can buy a course
After buying, he can download purchasing data
There implemented dynamic routing, dynamic register, and login and private routing for safety
